results.name: The Legend of the Leg End
Virus In Video Gameia - BETA TESTING
Gordon Ramsey Simulator by Simon van Klompenburg

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory, Capable of OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Video Memory, Capable of OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
